name: 2024 5th Information Communication Technologies Conference
content: Conference Proceedings: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by conference committees. Accepted papers will be included into Conference Proceedings and submitted to be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. ICTC has a credible publication history. All past ICTC conference proceedings papers have been indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Selected papers will be recommended to Q1 Digital Communications and Networks (DCN, ISSN: 2352-8648) after extension. Digital Communications and Networks (ISSN: 2352-8648) publishes rigorously peer-reviewed, high quality original articles and authoritative reviews that focus on communication systems and networks. All articles are published fully Open Access on ScienceDirect. The journal is indexed by DOAJ, Scopus, SCI, CSCD. Impact Factor: 7.9, Q1 | CiteScore: 9.9, Q1
